dct_description_sm: Issued in: Parallela Geographiae Beteris et Novae / Auctore Philippo Brietio. Gabrielis Cramoisy via Iaco baea, sub Ciconiis : Parisiis, MDCXLVIII (1648).
A small world map with California as an island and labeled “Caleforni Isle.” Terre Australe is very large and spread over both hemispheres.
Within a small cartouche at bottom right: Inter pag. 98 et 99.
Latin quotation above map reads: Hoc Est Pvctvm Qvod Inter Tot Gentes Ferro Et Igne Dividitvr. O Qvam Ridicvli Svnt Mor= Talivm Termini. Sen proe.nat. Quaest.
Shirley 372; Sabin 7934; Phillips Maps, p. 1088; BN Briet I, 18.
dct_publisher_sm: Chez Mich. van Lochom, graueur et imprimeur du Roy pour les tailles douces, demeurant rüe St. Jacques, a la rose blanche couronnée.
